DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether caffeine has any effect on birth weight.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Caffeine on Fetal Growth
DOC.criteria: Pregnant Consumption of at least 3 cups of coffee/day at recruitment Gestational age more than 20 weeks at recruitment Chronic kidney disease Epilepsy Insulin dependent diabetes Metabolic disorder Previous low birth weight delivery Previous preterm delivery
